thought: The workflow is implemented according to the user requirements and has been tested with the provided data, successfully reading from Google Sheets, classifying with AI, and sending emails via Gmail only for 'Customer' entries.

tool_input.result: The workflow has been implemented and tested successfully. It triggers manually, reads commercial entries from Google Sheets, classifies each Description using AI, and sends emails for 'to Customer' entries via Gmail with the specified format.
